title: Voyager 2, Plasma Waves Science, Wideband Electric Waveforms - W. Kurth (University Iowa)

parameters.name: Waveform_time
parameters.description: Raw Values, Centered/Scaled (RAW*2 - 15) - very high res. time-series. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function expand_wave_data (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Waveform', 'Epoch', 'timeOffsets']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
